mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DM WHERE ID1 IN ('${senderId}', '${receiverId}') OR ID2 IN ('${senderId}', '${receiverId}') ORDER BY DAY DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DM(ID1, ID2, DAY, PATH, LASTMSG) VALUES ('${id1}','${id2}', SYSDATE, '${path}', '${lastMsg}')
mapper.update: UPDATE DM SET LASTMSG = #{lastMsg} WHERE ID1 IN (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}) OR ID2 IN (#{senderId}, #{receiverId})
